description: If you’re looking for something awesomely refreshing in that blazing Austin heat, you gotta go to Sno. Co Shaved Ice, there’s really nothing quite like it. This funky flattop is where you’ll find a selection of fresh fruity flavors that are as cool as the fluffy ice itself. They’re cone-ing up wonderful originals like Cucumber Lime, Habanero Mango, Cayenne Pickle, and classic faves too, like Pina Colada, Fuzzy Navel, Mojito, and so much mo’. They’re located near the Butterfly Bar by the Vortex Theater, so you’re always invited to spike your icy concoction with some hard stuff next door. And if you show your love on social media, you’ll set yourself up with some sweet deals. Come on out to Sno. Co (and be sure to bring your friends) for a frenzy of frozen fun!
name: Sno.Co Flattop Shaved Ice
